Body: i'm trying to stop service which is running in my iot device through aws-iot job for this purpose. i follow this link https://github.com/aws/aws-iot-device-sdk-js to start
column9:
stop and restart my service

through this link i can able to reboot my iot device
column10: likewise i  also need to start
column11:
stop and restart the service which running in iot device.

service name would look like soucefileName.service.

manually i'm starting this service by
column12:
sudo systemctl start service. i want to achieve this by job.

i run this code in command line using aws cli https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/iot/create-job.html

aws iot create-job --job-id "jobname"  --targets "aws-arn/thingname" --document '{"operation": "stop"
column13:
packageName: "sourcefilename.service"}'

i didn't get any error but my service is not stopped.and also not able to understand what is package name in above code.

if any one have solution share with me. thanks in advance
